Trime

13 September, 2011

TriMe is a website giving access to a database of trials in mental health with an aim to getting people involved in trials by better informing of the content and nature of current trials.

Minervation created this site from scratch in 2007. I believe it is now a little outdated in terms of content, but the idea behind the website is very good I think.

Launch date: 10th April 2007

Links

  • TriMe
  • Minervation news item announcing the site
